title: the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Culture, Communications and Sport) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister culture communication sport) order 2025

title: the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Michael O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Michael O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Culture, Communications and Sport, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Culture, Communications 
and Sport with effect from 24th January 2025.
text_norm: 2 michael connor particular whose address deposited office department culture communication sport appointed special adviser minister culture communication sport effect 24th january 2025

title: the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 3. Theresa Newman, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Theresa Newman, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Culture, Communications and Sport, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Culture, Communications 
and Sport with effect from 24th January 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

1 July, 2025. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Tánaiste. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th July, 2025.
